item.title: how to get logic pro and adobe suite

if any of the websites mentioned in the article are inaccessible for any reason, download and enable 1.1.1.1 - you can also use a paid VPN such as mullvad

note: you need a bittorrent client for this. the most popular bittorrent clients are: qbittorrent, deluge, and transmission

go to rutracker.org

underneath the site logo, click –†–µ–≥–∏—Å—Ç—Ä–∞—Ü–∏—è

complete the registration process

verify your email (it's ok to use a throwaway)

underneath the site logo, click –í—Ö–æ–¥ and login

you can now use the input form underneath the site logo to search for an adobe product or logic pro

the current cracks are provided by TNT

a ch‚úÖckmark means that the torrent has been verified

users also have reputations within the community based on their contributions

click on the thread title

scroll down to and click üß≤ –°–∫–∞—á–∞—Ç—å –ø–æ magnet-—Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–µ

open the magnet with the bittorrent client you installed earlier and complete the process

once the file is downloaded, follow the instructions (if there‚Äôs a readme.nfo file open it using a text editor - it‚Äôll be your guide)

hope this helps ‚ú®

p.s. when the download is complete, remember to exit the bittorrent client else it‚Äôll stay on

item.title: how to pirate books and academic articles, and bypass paywalls
item.description: disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï if any of‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï

if any of the websites mentioned in the article are inaccessible for any reason, download and enable 1.1.1.1 - you can also use a paid VPN such as mullvad

how to find a book

note: this method works for most books. if your book is too niche, you have to work some internet magic to find it (private trackers and so on)

visit unblocked-pw.github.io

scroll all the way down to and click LibGen, select ISBN in ‚ÄùSearch in fields‚Äù, type in the ISBN of the book you want and press search

if your search turns out empty, reset ‚ÄúSearch in fields‚Äù and try searching by title and author (and if that turns out empty, you might be out of luck)

the format you‚Äôd like to download is up to you. i prioritize EPUB and PDF

EPUB is the most widely supported vendor-independent XML-based e-book format according to Wikipedia. if you have a Kindle, you have to download MOBI instead of EPUB (don‚Äôt get a Kindle; just my 2 cents)

click the title of the book

find the br‚ùåken image on left side of the new page and click it

then, click any of the mirrors listed (Cloudflare, IPFS.io, Infura) and save the book

congrats, you‚Äôve solved a modern day internet puzzle ‚ú®

how to find an academic article

visit unblocked-pw.github.io

scroll all the way down to and click SciHub, enter the article‚Äôs DOI and press search

how to bypass paywalls

i recommend installing firefox and using it as your primary browser

head over to the extensions webpage and install the ‚Äòbypass paywalls‚Äô extension

the source code is available here for those interested

p.s. i don‚Äôt listen to audiobooks much, but if you‚Äôre looking for audiobooks, go to unblocked-pw.github.io, scroll down to and click AudiobookBay üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

item.title: so you want to install windows 10
item.description: disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï if any of‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï

if any of the websites mentioned in the article are inaccessible for any reason, download and enable 1.1.1.1 - you can also use a paid VPN such as mullvad

here‚Äôs how i would maybe go about it

go to https://rentry.co/fwt (courtesy of /fwt/)

scroll down to downloading windows links, and click:

‚Äú10 SAC Consumer from Microsoft (lags behind MSDN refreshes): ISO‚Äù - or just click this link if it works

for type, select ‚ÄùWindows (Final)‚Äù

for version, select the top windows 10 version (or the one with the highest build number)

pick a language

select the file that ends in _x64.iso

save ‚ú®

go back to https://rentry.co/fwt and scroll down to recommended activators

find kms_vl_all, click on the pastebin thread

visit one of the listed urls, and download the file

the password is written in the pastebin (it‚Äôs the current year)

you can now install windows 10

when the installation is over, run kms_vl_all and follow the instructions

then, go to this pc, system properties and click ‚Äòchange product key‚Äô

use the following key, found here:

NPPR9-FWDCX-D2C8J-H872K-2YT43

run kms_vl_all again üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

you‚Äôre finished!

item.title: how to access the dark net
item.description: disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï go to‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
disclaimer: this article exists for educational purposes and because i believe in the open sharing of knowledge and information üíï

go to torproject and download tor

open tor and click the shüõ°eld icon on the top right corner

click Advanced Security Settings...

set ‚ÄôSecurity Level‚Äô to ‚ÄôSafest‚Äô

navigate to:

http://darkfailllnkf4vf.onion/

this is an aggregated list of .onion sites

the maintainer of this website is:

twitter.com/DarkDotFail

scroll down to Dreadit, copy and paste the .onion link in a new tab

in the sidebar, after you complete the captcha, click on /d/DarknetMarketNoobs

then, in the sidebar, click on the DNM Bible link

when you‚Äôre done and you understand, you‚Äôre ready ‚ú®üßö‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
